page.title: 17Health
page.content: Many of the people of Childs Ercall are registered with a family doctor at Hodnet, a village some 4 miles away.A few are registered with a group medical practice at the health centre in Market Drayton . The nearest large hospital is at Shrewsbury. Apart from a childrens dental clinic at the health centre in Market Drayton there are 2 dental practices some people also attend dental surgeries at Newport. There is a community car scheme in operation whereby volunteer drivers take people to the doctor or hospital if they have no other means of transport. There is a health visiter who visits the school once a term or more often if necessary to check hair. All children in primary school have a thorough medical in their first year, any chid having even the slightest proplem is seen yearly.
